title: The Cavity caper
creator_credit: Newfilms and South Australian Film Corporation
brief_description: A dramatisation for children on the subject of dental care, in which Big Al and Louis try to outwit Kev Casual, but the Tooth Fairy comes to the rescue. The Army is also brought into the fight against plaque No other credits available. Cast includes Colin Friels. Suitable for upper primary level.
